policy_coverage_verification.submission: Covered under Section 3 - Vehicle Collision Coverage
policy_coverage_verification.correct_answer: Covered under Section 3 - Vehicle Collision Coverage

approval_reasoning.submission: According to Section 2.1 of the Claims Handling Procedure, for Vehicle Collision Claims, adjusters have settlement authority up to $3,000.  As per Section 2.2, settlements exceeding this limit require supervisor approval, and the proposed settlement of $6,500 exceeds the adjuster's authority.
approval_reasoning.correct_answer: According to Section 2.1 of the Company Claims Handling Procedure, for Vehicle Collision Claims, adjusters have settlement authority up to $3,000. The proposed settlement of $2,800 is below this limit.
